Package eu.datacrop.maize.model_repository.api.services

Class SystemApiServicesImpl

java.lang.Object
eu.datacrop.maize.model_repository.api.services.SystemApiServicesImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SystemApiServices
@Service public class SystemApiServicesImpl extends Object implements SystemApiServices
This class implements the services offered by the API layer pertaining to IoT Systems.
Since:
version 0.3.0
Author:
Angela-Maria Despotopoulou [Athens, Greece]

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity retrieveSystemByDatabaseID(String systemID)

      retrieveSystemByDatabaseID in interface SystemApiServices
      Parameters:
      systemID - A UUID that uniquely identifies an existing System in the database, not null.
      Returns:
      A data structure to be transmitted from server to client as response.

    • retrieveAllSystems

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity retrieveAllSystems(int page, int size)
      Method that connects to the persistence layer to retrieve all Systems paginated.
      Specified by:
      retrieveAllSystems in interface SystemApiServices
      Parameters:
      page - The page to retrieve.
      size - The intended size of pages.
      Returns:
      A wrapped data transfer object with either information on the retrieved Systems or failure messages.
